text: Alessandra Mussolini is an Italian former model and now a politician. She was born on 30 December 1962 in Rome. She is the granddaughter of the fascist dictator of Italy, Benito Mussolini, and the niece of the Italian actress Sophia Loren. Her son Romano Floriani Mussolini, is a professional football player at S.S. Lazio. She has outspoken views similar to fascism and she was a member of the neo-fascist movimento Sociale Italiano political party. title: Alessandra Mussolini
